ticket.title: Schema dump doesn't preserve table options
ticket.original-body:
ActiveRecord 3.0.3
The schema dumper (ActiveRecord::SchemaDumper) does not output the :options parameter when it generates the create_table call. This means the schema.rb won't include (for example) the table engine specification under MySQL, which is set using the :options parameter. Hence, it will break if a MySQL-based schema depends on a particular table engine (other than the default InnoDB).
